about_the_game:
“” is a real-person interactive video game product with unique characteristics, which is simple in gameplay, exciting in stories and clear in the main line.

Abundant interactions, fun games and the development of stories in free choice.

In “” , the player, with a “first-person perspective” will act as a despair youth who has met career setbacks and visit Japan alone in an unwilling mood. It means a new beginning for the player with many unknown challenges. The expectancy and emotional devotion of the player, from the moment he is aboard, will be fully ignited.

The player, for a new life and career in Japan, will face PK tasks through various interesting and fierce workplace tests utilizing his own “talent” and “skills”, in which he will defeat rivals of all sorts and win the support and appraise of the boss and colleagues. As a result, he will rise from a laborer to a boss, settling down in Japan and becoming a winner in life.   

In terms of love, which is the most important point, the player will encounter four Japanese girls romantically in different scenes and at different time in Japan. According to his own preference, the player is free to choose the development direction for the relationship with them. He can have sweet and “Japanese-style” dates with them. He can also help them out of thrilling and exciting dangers and plights as a hero. Through the interaction operation of the player, the girl, while in the contact with the player, will gradually improve the “goodwill value” between each other, and promote the development of each branch line, so as to unlock more hidden content and surprise small Easter eggs.  

1.[Fun interaction]: Facing skill PK, achievement collection, heartbeat value challenge, and luck small game, the player is likely to accidentally trigger the “feature funny ending”. The main line is clear, and it is full of details, generating easy experience without burden or pressure for the player.

 

2.[Wonderful and rich plots]: Dating battle, court victory or defeat, hero saving the beauty, witty fight against the villain, the line of life and death, warm, touched and romantic feelings, as well as thrilling and exciting dangers and sufferings will let the player get into the game in a second.

 

3.[Female protagonists in vivid images]: Five different types of girls, who are lovely, delicate, clever, charming and reserved, will let the player feel the five kinds of love at the same time. The player will harvest enough emotional feedback, enjoy emotional value full of love, and can also choose the one that he prefers according to his preference, heading for his own love ending.

 

[Movie texture images]: Shot with real person and in real scenes, with a number of landmark scenery and night scenes, it will generate pleasant visual experience and immersive atmosphere

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
